name: Preny
description:
Preny AI is currently the Vietnam's leader in AI chatbot and mini CRM solutions, helping thousands of businesses increase their conversion rates by over 50%. By applying advanced AI algorithms and optimized conversational workflows, Preny has developed an intelligent chatbot that responds contextually and automates customer support across multiple platforms.
 
Moreover, the mini CRM system enables businesses to categorize, monitor, and analyze customer behavior, allowing them to develop more effective customer care strategies. Preny has delivered a grand solution that enhances sales performance and personalized interactions in a flexible and sustainable way.
focus_areas: AI Agent Automation for Marketing (Ads / Email / SMS)
